entry.title: TT8 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Merit's wig (pictured), discovered in the tomb TT8, still shone with perfumed oils at the time of its discovery?

entry.title: Mishal Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that at the age of 82, Kuwaiti crown prince Mishal Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah is the oldest heir apparent in the world?

entry.title: Jordan Stephens (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Jordan Stephens has released solo music under his own name and the pseudonyms "J Steezy", "Rizzle", "Wildhood", "Gnarly Ventura", and "Al, the Native"?

entry.title: Marsala Punic shipwreck (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that parts of the Marsala Punic shipwreck were marked with alphabetical signs intended to facilitate and speed up assembly?

entry.title: Stanley Woodward (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that prior to attorney Stanley Woodward representing Donald Trump aide Walt Nauta and Oath Keeper Kelly Meggs, he represented tenants in D.C. who were facing eviction?

entry.title: a California public TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that staff of a California public TV station were unaware it was broadcasting in color until a viewer called to compliment their color signal?

entry.title: Klallamornis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the flightless suliforme Klallamornis likely went extinct when the volcanic islands it used for shelter along the coast of the Pacific Northwest eroded away into the Pacific Ocean?

entry.title: Kevin A. Gilroy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Kevin A. Gilroy served as the mayor of Gilroy?
